thread.title: RUMOURS: Man Utd want Ibrahimovic to stay until 2019
thread.title_full: RUMOURS: Man Utd want Ibrahimovic to stay until 2019

title: RUMOURS: Man Utd want Ibrahimovic to stay until 2019
text:
0 Jan 17, 2017 7:18:06 PM The Swede, who arrived last summer, has proven to be a huge success at Old Trafford and the club are keen to retain his services 
Manchester United are eager to tie Zlatan Ibrahimovic down to a new contract that will extend his stay at the club until 2019, according to The Sun . 
The Swede, 35, has scored 19 goals this season since signing on a free transfer from Paris Saint-Germain. 
In addition to activating the clause in Ibrahimovic's contract that will keep him at Old Trafford for a second year, United want to negotiate a third campaign.
